name: Dungeon Splitter
description:
Move through the AI generated dungeon, battling monsters, and defeating the boss at the end. Split into multiple pieces to try and not immediately die from the enemy's lethal bullets.

Twist! You die in one hit. However, you can split the player up into multiple pieces, but you deal less damage.

(Will be added in the future):

  • Advanced lighting
  • More enemies
  • Better bosses
  • Traps
  • Collectables
